pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.4.10: Kālaṃ āharissathā”ti → kālaṃ harissathāti (bj, pts1); kāle harissathāti (s1-3)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:1.4.27: catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā → cātumāsapaccaya ... (s1-3, pts1) | uttari → uttariṃ (bj, s1-3)
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc47:2.2.1: Na bhesajjena karaṇīyena → na bhesajjena karaṇīye (bj, s1-3); na bhesajjakaraṇīyena (pts1)
